Archetype-Duelist -- Male Changeling Human Fighter: 10
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +3 Charisma: +2
Background: Emissary Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 9011/10000 Level: 10 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Hardy Traveler: +1 Encumbered Bulk/+1 Maximum Bulk
Hardy Traveler: +10 Speed during overland travel
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 6; General: 2; Skill: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Fighter (Key Attribute); Fighter (Weapon Group); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Additional Lore (Gladitorial Lore); Assurance (Athletics); Assurance (Society); Assurance (Tea Lore); Courtly Graces; Disarming Stance; Dueling Dance; Dueling Parry; Dueling Riposte; Duelist Dedication; Duelist's Challenge; Guiding Riposte; Hardy Traveler; Haughty Obstinacy; Improved Dueling Riposte; Selfless Parry; Skill Training (Accounting Lore); Skill Training (Tea Lore); Student Of The Dueling Arts; Unconventional Weaponry (Temple Sword) Changeling Features: Changeling Heritage; Low-Light Vision Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Dexterity); Attribute Boosts; Battle Hardened; Battlefield Surveyor; Bravery; Class Trained (Fighter); Combat Flexibility; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Dexterity; Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Fighter Weapon Mastery; General Feats; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spears; Weapon Specialization Emissary Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Charisma, Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Multilingual; Skill Trained (Society; Choose 1 from any Settlement Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feat (Choose 3 from any)
Duelist Dedication: Has the Quick Draw feature
Fighter Feats: Class Feat (Choose 6 from any)
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Fighter Weapon Mastery: 1 selection
General Feats: General Feat (Choose 2 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feat (Choose 5 from any)
Changeling Heritage: Has the changeling trait and can take changeling ancestry feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +19 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Accounting Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Diplomacy: +14 (charisma; trained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained)
Acrobatics: +16 (dexterity; trained) Dragon Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Alcohol Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Gladitorial Lore: +20 (intelligence; master) Society: +20 (intelligence; master)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Stealth: +16 (dexterity; trained)
Athletics: +14 (strength; trained) Medicine: +3 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +3 (wisdom; untrained)

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 4 from any)
Skill Training (Accounting Lore): Skill Trained (Accounting Lore)
Skill Training (Tea Lore): Skill Trained (Tea Lore)
Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 22 on Athletics checks
Assurance (Society): Can take an automatic 26 on Society checks
Assurance (Tea Lore): Can take an automatic 24 on Tea Lore checks
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 26 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bastard Sword (+16 1d8+2 S [2h d12]; strength; expert); Longbow (+18 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Maul (+16 1d12+2 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Spears): Attack Master (Simple Spears; Martial Spears)/Attack Expert (Advanced Spears)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Temple Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Temple Sword)
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Combat Flexibility: Gains 1 chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level during daily prep
Disarming Stance: (1) Stance gives +1 to Disarm and +2 vs. Disarm, and allows Disarming foes 2 sizes larger, when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Dueling Dance: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Dueling Parry
Dueling Parry: (1) Gives +2 Armor Class until the start of the next turn when wielding a one-handed melee weapon with the other hand free
Dueling Riposte: (R) While using Dueling Parry, makes a Strike or Disarm attempt on a foe who critically fails an attack on self
Duelist's Challenge: (1) Selects a foe as a dueling opponent until the encounter ends or it is defeated or flees; subsequent successful attacks on this foe using a one-handed weapon with the other hand free inflict additional damage equal to the number of damage dice; subsequent successful attacks on others reduce the damage by the same amount
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Guiding Riposte: A successful Dueling Riposte Strike moves the target 10'
Improved Dueling Riposte: Gives an additional reaction to make a Dueling Riposte once per turn, even when not using Dueling Parry
Quick Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and Strikes
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Selfless Parry: Using Dueling Parry gives adjacent allies +1 Armor Class/Can use Dueling Riposte against foes that critically fail Strikes on adjacent allies
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Student Of The Dueling Arts: Can swap Duelist Dedication feats during daily prep, and can enter any duelist stance by using twice the normal number of actions
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; master); Reflex: +18 (dexterity; expert); Will: +17 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Battle Hardened: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Battle Hardened: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 6 available vs. 10 allocated
Dueling Dance Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 12, dueling parry feature (currently 1) and fighter level (currently 10) >= 12 or duelist dedication level (currently 10) >= 14
Guiding Riposte Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 14, dueling riposte feature (currently 1) and fighter level (currently 10) >= 14 or duelist dedication level (currently 10) >= 16
Improved Dueling Riposte Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 12, dueling riposte feature (currently 1) and fighter level (currently 10) >= 12 or duelist dedication level (currently 10) >= 14
Student Of The Dueling Arts Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 12 and duelist dedication feature (currently 1)
